sourcesContent:
<template>
    <button @click=onClick() :style="{ backgroundColor: color }" class="btn">{{ text }}</button>
</template>

<script>
export default {
    name: 'Button_View',
    props: {
        text: String,
        color: String,
    },
    methods: {
        onClick() {
            this.$emit('toggle-add-tas')
        }
    }
}
</script>
